flawed_nl_solution:
Kaiden collects 158 cans his first week and 259 cans during the second week. 158 + 259 = <<158+259=417>>417 cans of soup
Kaiden wants to collect a total of 500 cans, so he still needs 500 - 417 = <<500-417=38>>38 cans of soup

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 83, not 38. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
